mapper.insert: INSERT INTO company_schedule (schedule_title, schedule_content, start_at, end_at, created_by, created_at) VALUES (#{scheduleTitle}, #{scheduleContent}, #{startAt}, #{endAt}, #{createdBy}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT schedule_id, schedule_title, schedule_content, start_at, end_at FROM company_schedule WHERE schedule_id = #{scheduleId}
mapper.update: UPDATE company_schedule SET schedule_title = #{scheduleTitle}, schedule_content = #{scheduleContent}, start_at = #{startAt}, end_at = #{endAt}, updated_by = #{updatedBy}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE schedule_id = #{scheduleId}
